text: Habib Saher (, , born 1903 in Mianeh, Eastern Azerbaijan — died 1988 in Tehran), was an Iranian poet of Azerbaijani people, Habib wrote and his poems was in Azerbaijani, Persian and French language. ==References== ==External links== * Həbib Sahir. Seçilmiş əsərləri. title: Habib Saher
